wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Wallwork (born 26 May 1941) is a retired male race walker from England, who represented his home nation at two Commonwealth Games.

response: * 26 May – Ron Wallwork, English race walker

response: Raymond Christopher "Ray" Middleton (born 9 August 1936) is a British former racewalker.Raymond Middleton. All-Athletics. Retrieved on 17 April 2016. He represented Great Britain at the 1964 Summer Olympics in the 50 kilometres race walk. He was also a six-time participant at the IAAF World Race Walking Cup between 1961 and 1973.IAAF World Race Walking Cup Taicang 2014 Facts & Figures. IAAF. Retrieved on 16 April 2016. He took silver medals at the 1963 IAAF World Race Walking Cup (behind István Havasi) and 1966 British Empire and Commonwealth Games (behind Ron Wallwork).IAAF World Race Walking Cup. GBR Athletics. Retrieved on 17 April 2016.Commonwealth Games. GBR Athletics. Retrieved on 17 April 2016.
